codelist-item.name: Regional
Régional

codelist-item.name: Multi-national
Multinational
codelist-item.description: The activity scope covers multiple countries, that don't constitute a region

codelist-item.name: National
National
codelist-item.description: The activity scope covers one country

codelist-item.name: Sub-national: Multi-first-level administrative areas
Infranational : multiples régions administratives de premier niveau
codelist-item.description: The activity scope covers more than one first-level subnational administrative areas (e.g. counties, provinces, states)

codelist-item.name: Sub-national: Single first-level administrative area
Infranational : Région administrative unique de premier niveau
codelist-item.description: The activity scope covers one first-level subnational administrative area (e.g. country, province, state)

codelist-item.name: Sub-national: Single second-level administrative area
Infranational : Région administrative unique de deuxième niveau
codelist-item.description: The activity scope covers one second-level subnational administrative area (e.g. municipality or district)

codelist-item.name: Single location
Un seul emplacement
codelist-item.description: The activity scope covers one single location (e.g. town, village, farm)
